entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudListProducts #53927
  • Perf improvement: mapaction #53926
  • Controls are not working properly in.NET 8.0 Web App Per Page (interactive location) template layout pages. #53925
  • Issue using @microsoft/signalr with Azure Serverless in a DenoJS backend #53923
  • RegisterCustomElement stopped working in Blazor 8 #53920
  • launchSettings.json ASPNETCORE_ENVIRONMENT should not be overridden by environment variable #53916
  • .NET Blazor - two way data binding with handler method in parent component issue #53914
  • Perf regression: plaintext #53913
  • Perf improvement: mvc #53911
  • a second operation was started on this context #53910

Closed

  • Error boundaries may block redirects by handling exceptions of type `NavigationException` #52777
    8.0.x
  • BlazorWasm benchmark broken (docker version) #53033
    9.0-preview2
  • Perf regression: connectionclosehttps, json, json #53912
  • Constructor injection for Blazor components #18088
    9.0-preview2
  • RAM problems when downloading files #40658
    Backlog
  • BlazorWasm benchmark failing #49713
    9.0-preview2
  • Blazor Inputs can't bind to variables that start with ÅÄÖ when upgrading to .net 8 #53891
    8.0.x
  • PageTitle does not work with disabled prerendering and render mode InteractiveWebAssembly #53917
  • Multiple 401 when using Windows authentication on HTTP.sys #13634
    Backlog
  • POST operation in Production environment: System.InvalidOperationException: The SPA default page middleware could not return the default page '/index.html' #34420
    .NET 9 Planning
  • JWT token silent renew breaks and causes crash on React template with authentication #17962
    .NET 9 Planning
  • Blazor 'System.Reflection.AmbiguousMatchException' on .NET 8 #52755
    8.0.x
  • [Blazor] Public API changes to enable compression on Interactive components for Blazor Web #53821
  • Perf regression: json #53876
  • SignalR calls not working #53903
  • http client is very slow ib blazor .net 8 #53643
  • Blazor component AuthorizeView can accept the AuthorizationPolicy combine function result. #52920
  • There is a problem with transmitting and receiving url routing parameters #53683
  • Blazor Server Rendering does not work on iPhones with a version lower than 17.3 #53663

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/8.0] [Blazor] Fix hot reload memory leak #53928
    Servicing-consider, area-blazor, 8.0.x
  • PathString.StartsWithSegments: Clarify trailing slash behavior in doc comments #53924
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `4872968` to `b75ecf1` #53918
    area-infrastructure

Merged

  • [Blazor] Prevent error boundaries from handling exceptions of type `NavigationException` #53826
    area-blazor, 9.0-preview2
  • Move SB metadata to intermediates #53749
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview2
  • Update Node.js version in Blazor WebAssembly perf benchmarks #53921
    area-blazor, 9.0-preview2
  • Add unit test to confirm change token is disposed during #53827
    area-blazor, 9.0-preview2
  • [Blazor] Constructor injection #53915
    area-blazor, 9.0-preview2
  • http.sys: Allow configuring HTTP_AUTH_EX_FLAGs as options #51833
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking, 9.0-preview2
  • [Blazor] Pass the member info directly #53874
    area-blazor, 9.0-preview2
  • [Blazor] Websocket compression API review feedback #53835
    area-blazor, 9.0-preview2

Updated

  • Makes RemoteAuthenticationContext serialize correctly #53819
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0] [Blazor] Pass the member info directly #53892
    area-blazor, 8.0.x
